Utility Functions¶

These are functions that are utilised in larger functions. However, you may find them useful on their own!

utils.earth_to_pixel(earth_coord, meta[, ...])

convert image to the pixel coord from earth coord

utils.pixel_to_earth(pixel_coord, meta[, ...])

convert image to the earth coord from pixel coord

read.read(file)

Extracts the data and meta data from the input file.

satmap.fov(meta)

Field of view of the images captured by the instrument (i.e., the difference between the boundaries).

satmap.centre(meta)

Centre of the image taken by the instrument.

aigeanpy
